io.spine.server.stand

Class StandUpdateDelivery

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.spine.server.delivery.Delivery<EntityStateEnvelope<?,?>,Stand>
      • io.spine.server.stand.StandUpdateDelivery

  • @SPI
public abstract class StandUpdateDelivery
extends Delivery<EntityStateEnvelope<?,?>,Stand>
    A base class for the strategies on delivering the Entity state updates to the Stand.

    Common delivery sources are AggregateRepository and ProjectionRepository.

    • Method Detail

      • getDeliveryAction

        protected java.lang.Runnable getDeliveryAction(Stand consumer,
                                               EntityStateEnvelope<?,?> deliverable)
        Description copied from class: Delivery
        Defines what should be done to deliver a given deliverable to the targetConsumer.

        Each Delivery implementation defines this behaviour depending on the type of the consumer.

        The result is defined as Runnable, as this action will be executed by a delegate Executor, according to the strategy implementation regulated by shouldPostponeDelivery() and deliverNow() methods.

        Specified by:
        getDeliveryAction in class Delivery<EntityStateEnvelope<?,?>,Stand>
        Parameters:
        consumer - the consumer to deliver the item to
        deliverable - the item to be delivered
        Returns:
        the action on how to deliver the given item to the consumer.

      • consumersFor

        protected java.util.Collection<Stand> consumersFor(EntityStateEnvelope deliverable)
        Description copied from class: Delivery
        Determines a collection of the consumers for the given deliverable.
        Specified by:
        consumersFor in class Delivery<EntityStateEnvelope<?,?>,Stand>
        Parameters:
        deliverable - the item to deliver
        Returns:
        the collection of the consumers.

      • directDelivery

        public static StandUpdateDelivery directDelivery()
        Obtains a pre-defined instance of the StandUpdateDelivery, which does NOT postpone any event dispatching and uses direct executor for operation.
        Returns:
        the pre-configured direct delivery
